meanings.definition: A thin, crisp disc-shaped Indian bread typically made from lentil or chickpea flour.
meanings.sent1: The poppadom was crunchy and round.
meanings.sent2: We enjoyed the poppadom with our curry.
meanings.sent3: The poppadom told a joke to the naan bread.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as light and crispy as a poppadom.
meanings.sent5: The poppadom crumbled like autumn leaves underfoot.

meanings.definition: A popular Indian snack served with chutney or as an accompaniment to a meal.
meanings.sent1: I always order a poppadom before my curry.
meanings.sent2: The poppadom was delicious with the mint chutney.
meanings.sent3: The poppadom danced on the plate, teasing the samosa.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as satisfying as a poppadom dipped in sauce.
meanings.sent5: The poppadom added a crunchy twist to the meal.
